todos.title: Set up Android Studio
todos.description: Install and configure Android Studio for the development environment.

todos.title: Implement User Authentication
todos.description: Integrate user authentication functionality using Firebase Authentication.

todos.title: Design UI for Main Screen
todos.description: Create an appealing user interface for the main screen of the app.

todos.title: Test Push Notifications
todos.description: Implement and test push notifications using Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM).

todos.title: Implement Database Integration
todos.description: Integrate SQLite or Room Database for local data storage.

todos.title: Bug Fixing and Optimization
todos.description: Address and fix any bugs while optimizing the app's performance.

todos.title: Implement User Profile Feature
todos.description: Develop a user profile feature, allowing users to manage their profiles.

todos.title: Optimize UI for Different Screen Sizes
todos.description: Ensure the app's user interface is optimized for various Android screen sizes.

todos.title: Write Unit Tests
todos.description: Create unit tests to ensure the reliability of critical app functionalities.

todos.title: Prepare for Beta Testing
todos.description: Finalize features and prepare the app for beta testing with selected users.
